rounds.observation:
[GAME] Welcome to the Tic Tac Toe Arena! You are competing as Player 0.
Victory is achieved by claiming three consecutive squares in any direction: horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.
To make your move, choose a numbered position (0-8) on the grid and submit it in brackets.
Example: '[7]' will claim the bottom-right corner of the board.

Your battle symbol is 'O', while your opponent fights with 'X'.

 3 | 4 | 5 
---+---+---
 6 | 7 | 8
